SEARCH
Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.client.view.gui

Class GameControllerFX

java.lang.Object
ingsw.codex_naturalis.client.view.gui.GameControllerFX
public class GameControllerFX extends Object
Controller for the GameFXML scene. This class is responsible for handling all the events that happens in the game, updating the GUI accordingly to the events received by the server, and collecting the events from the player and notifying them to update the Server calling viewGUI's method.
